title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3587/85 of 16 December 1985 amending, by reason of the accession of Spain and Portugal, Regulation (EEC) No 3321/82 as regards the list of fishery products and sizes qualifying for the carry-over premium
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 3587/85
of 16 December 1985
amending, by reason of the accession of Spain and Portugal, Regulation (EEC) No 3321/82 as regards the list of fishery products and sizes qualifying for the carry-over premium
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 3321/82 is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 March 1986 subject to the entry into force of the Treaty of Accession of Spain and Portugal.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 December 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 351, 11. 12. 1982, p. 20.
ANNEX
'ANNEX I
// Description   // Sizes (1)   // 1. Redfish (Sebastes spp.)   // 2,3   // 2. Gold (Gadus morhua)   // 3,4,5   // 3. Saithe (Pollachius virens)   // 3,4   // 4. Haddock (Melanogrammus aeglefinus)   // 2,3,4   // 5. Whiting (Merlangus merlangus)   // 2,3,4   // 6. Megrim (Lepidorhombus spp.)   // 1,2   // 7. Pomfret, Pays' bream (Brama spp.)  // 1,2   // 8. Anglerfish, Monkfish (Lophius spp.)  // 2,3,4,5   // 9. Shrimps (Crangon crangon)   // 1
(1) The sizes of the products concerned are those defined pursuant to Article 2 of Regulation (EEC) No 3796/81.'
